SimpleDatabaseInput.QueryString: SELECT IPCODE, type FROM ( SELECT vc.ipcode AS IPCODE, 'Bra' as type ,SUM(pt.points) OVER (PARTITION BY md.a_ipcode) AS ttl_pts ,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY md.a_ipcode order by md.a_ipcode) rn FROM bp_ae.lw_pointtransaction pt INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointevent pe ON pt.pointeventid = pe.pointeventid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointtype p ON pt.pointtypeid = p.pointtypeid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pt.vckey = vc.vckey INNER JOIN bp_ae.ats_memberdetails md ON vc.ipcode = md.a_ipcode INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_loyaltymember lm on vc.ipcode = lm.ipcode -- AEO-646 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ( (pe.name IN ('Bra Purchase - 1' , 'Bra Purchase - 15' , 'B5G1 Bra Purchase' , 'Bra Credit' , 'Bra AECC Bonus Credit' , 'Returned Bra Reward Points')) AND (pt.transactiondate < trunc(SYSDATE - 14))) OR pe.name IN ('Bra Return')) AND p.name IN ('Bra Points') --AND NVL (md.a_employeecode, 0) = 0 AEO-816 AND pt.pointsconsumed = 0 AND pt.transactiontype <> 4 AND pt.expirationdate > SYSDATE AND nvl(lm.memberstatus,3) = 1 -- AEO-646 AND AE_ISINPILOT(md.a_extendedplaycode) = 1 -- AEO-Point Conversion AND ((nvl(length(md.a_emailaddress), 0) > 0) OR (nvl(md.a_pendingcellverification, 1) = 0 AND nvl(length(md.a_mobilephone), 0) > 0)) UNION ALL SELECT vc.ipcode AS IPCODE, 'Jean' as TYPE ,SUM(pt.points) OVER (PARTITION BY md.a_ipcode) AS ttl_pts ,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY md.a_ipcode order by md.a_ipcode) FROM bp_ae.lw_pointtransaction pt INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointevent pe ON pt.pointeventid = pe.pointeventid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointtype p ON pt.pointtypeid = p.pointtypeid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pt.vckey = vc.vckey INNER JOIN bp_ae.ats_memberdetails md ON vc.ipcode = md.a_ipcode INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_loyaltymember lm on vc.ipcode = lm.ipcode WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ( (pe.name IN ('Jean Purchase' , 'B5G1 Jean Purchase' , 'Jeans Credit' ,'Jean AECC Bonus Credit' ,'Returned Jean Reward Points')) AND (pt.transactiondate < trunc(SYSDATE - 14))) OR pe.name IN ('Jean Return')) AND p.name IN ('Jean Points') AND pt.pointsconsumed = 0 AND nvl(lm.memberstatus,3) = 1 AND pt.transactiontype <> 4 AND pt.expirationdate > SYSDATE AND pt.transactiondate > to_date('9/30/2015 11:59:59PM', 'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mi:ssPM') AND AE_ISINPILOT(md.a_extendedplaycode) = 1 -- AEO-Point Conversion AND (( nvl(length(md.a_emailaddress), 0) > 0) OR (nvl(md.a_pendingcellverification, 1) = 0 AND nvl(length(md.a_mobilephone), 0) > 0)) ) WHERE ttl_pts >= 5 AND rn = 1
